name: Knight vs Mage
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare #34. Theme: Two Button Controls.

How to play:

There is a box above your character's head. In that box, icons will proceed from right to left. When they reach the highlighted area in the middle, press the corresponding button:

SWORD ICON: Press A to attack. Deals damage.

SHIELD ICON: Press D to defend.

DODGE ICON: Press nothing.

POTION ICON: Press nothing. Gains life.

If you do the wrong thing on any of these, you take damage.
